name: Add stream/closed tests to test/test_sse_builtins.valk
notes: Test stream/closed returns future, completes with :closed when stream closes. Use existing SSE test patterns.
accept: grep stream/closed test/test_sse_builtins.valk finds tests, make test passes

name: Refactor src/modules/test.valk to use aio/all for result collection
notes: Replace *test-async-passed-atom*, *test-async-failed-atom*, *test-async-timed-out-atom*, *test-async-pending-atom* with aio/all + reduce. Each test returns result struct.
accept: grep -c atom.*async src/modules/test.valk returns 0, make test passes

name: Refactor src/modules/test.valk to use aio/race for timeouts
notes: Replace per-test timed-out atom with aio/race between test and timeout. Replace *test-suite-timed-out* with suite-level race.
accept: grep -c atom src/modules/test.valk returns 0, make test passes

name: Refactor test/test_sse_concurrency_short.valk to remove atoms
notes: Use aio/semaphore for rate limiting (MAX_ACTIVE=5), aio/all for result collection, stream/closed for stream state. 8 atoms to remove.
accept: grep -c atom test/test_sse_concurrency_short.valk returns 0, test passes

name: Refactor test/stress/test_sse_concurrency_short.valk to remove atoms
notes: Same pattern as test/test_sse_concurrency_short.valk. 8 atoms to remove.

name: Refactor test/stress/test_sse_concurrency.valk to remove atoms
notes: Same pattern as test/test_sse_concurrency_short.valk. 8 atoms to remove.

name: Add deprecation warnings to atom builtins in parser.c
notes: Add VALK_WARN to valk_builtin_atom, valk_builtin_atom_get, valk_builtin_atom_set, valk_builtin_atom_add, valk_builtin_atom_sub. Lines 4044-4100.
accept: build/valk -e "(atom 1)" prints deprecation warning to stderr, make test passes

name: Remove valk_atom_t struct and builtin functions from parser.c
notes: Remove lines 4040-4100 (struct + 5 functions). Phase 5 breaking change.
accept: grep -c valk_atom_t src/parser.c returns 0, make build succeeds

name: Remove atom builtin registrations from parser.c
notes: Remove lines 5215-5219 where atom, atom/get, atom/set!, atom/add!, atom/sub! are registered.
accept: grep -c "atom" src/parser.c returns 0 (for builtin strings), make build succeeds

name: Delete test/test_atom_builtins.valk
notes: File has 16 tests for atom API. All tests obsolete after atom removal.

name: Remove atom error tests from test/test_parser_errors.c
notes: Remove test_atom_get_wrong_type, test_atom_set_wrong_type, test_atom_add_wrong_type, test_atom_sub_wrong_type. Lines 1185-1223.
accept: grep -c atom test/test_parser_errors.c returns 0, make test passes

name: Final verification: no atom references remain
notes: Verify: grep -r atom src/*.valk test/*.valk | grep -v atomic | wc -l returns 0. build/valk -e "(atom 1)" returns Unknown function error.
accept: make test passes, all acceptance criteria from spec phases 1-5 verified

desc: Task t-uemb has dependency t-28nk which doesn't exist in task list. stream/closed is already implemented in src/aio/http2/stream/aio_stream_builtins.c - dependency should be removed
